title: Chain Reaction
story_summary: Daria restarts Halden's prediction engine and the city snaps into smooth order. Life becomes easy but too quiet. Artists and bold voices vanish as the system mutes anything unexpected. Ghostly graffiti appears at night. The city wonders if calm is worth losing its spirit.

official.headline: Queues Gone
official.anchor_line: Stenograd celebrates as long queues at services and checkpoints vanish overnight.
official.contextual_reframing: Efficient coordination ensures seamless movement and greater convenience for all citizens.

official.headline: Order Perfected
official.anchor_line: BCI updates bring harmony and stability, praised as a new era of calm by state media.
official.contextual_reframing: Predictive management guarantees security and predictability, reinforcing civic trust each day.

official.headline: Creative Voices Fade
official.anchor_line: Citizens quietly debate the cost of progress as original thinkers and artists become less visible.
official.contextual_reframing: The city now enjoys unprecedented safety and order, marking a decisive step into the future.

underground.headline: Vanishing Acts
underground.anchor_line: Our friends - artists, poets, dissenters - disappear from the city overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: Order comes at a price. BCI sweeps away anyone it can't predict.

underground.headline: Silence Engine
underground.anchor_line: Halden's secret code is back online, controlling our futures behind closed doors.
underground.contextual_reframing: No debate. Decisions made by silent machines. Our lives, rewritten without consent.

underground.headline: Chill Behind the Calm
underground.anchor_line: Streets look peaceful, but our voices are missing. This is what quiet really means.
underground.contextual_reframing: We all feel it. Safety for some, silence for the rest. Is Stenograd still ours?
